item.title: Spiel des Jahres 2022 predictions
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: Spiel des Jahres 2022 is around the corner! (Has it really been a year already since we last spoke with each other? ðŸ˜…) We’re blessed with another strong year full of wonderful games that all compete for the most prestigious award in board gaming. As in the previous years, I’ll try to predict what games have the best shot at ending up on the longlist (aka recommendations) and the shortlist (aka nominations).
